channel.title: billy bucket
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "billy bucket" - saving items on looping?

item.title: Re: billy bucket
item.content:encoded: on top of this, if you have less then a certain number out side your bucket, you get free stamina, and if you are at 180+ items out of your bucket you get penalties.

item.title: Re: billy bucket
item.content:encoded: I just use the button to store all items at the end of the day and at the start of the next one I cllcik the thing to take them all out.

item.title: Re: billy bucket
item.content:encoded:
And the bucket menu is there so you can store items you wont be using for a while. For example I have finished wasteland, but still have rebreathers, foodpills, ect. I put them in the bucket so that I don't have to deal with them in my menus.

It is also a secure trade system. Using a item from the shop(avian attraction spray?) and you can go to a trading menu(it's in the bucket menu) and make trades with another player with the items in the bucket. IMPORTANT NOTE: The shop item only makes this possible for one day. So if you are going to make a trade you must do it the same day you buy the item.

This is a more secure way then sending an item to someone and hoping they send one back.

item.title: Re: billy bucket
item.content:encoded: Billy Buckets are used in the process to turn Emosuke Lvl 2 into Emosuke Lvl 3, and they're also jutsu reagents for the RedEye-exclusive jutsu, Emosuke Style: Get in the Bucket.

item.title: Re: billy bucket
item.content:encoded: i see. okay. then why do we need a bucket anyway?

item.title: Re: billy bucket
item.content:encoded:
…huh? I think you're misunderstanding quite a few things here.

Items that loop will loop period, simple as that. You do not need to "save them with a billy bucket" nor do I know how you would do so, since the billy bucket itself is an item that can't be used in such a manner.

If you mean the bucket menu, the only items you can put there are the items that can loop to begin with, and I don't think you can loop with anything in the bucket either at the moment…but that's not a billy bucket. It's just a storage area called the bucket.

item.title: billy bucket
item.content:encoded: which items can be saved with the billy bucket before i loop? i only have one so far and i wonder if i should get emosuke lev 3 or save items to loop. thanks
